info.name: iPhone 13 Pro
info.description: The iPhone 13 Pro features a powerful A15 Bionic chip, stunning display, and 5G capabilities.

info.name: iPhone 12
info.description: The iPhone 12 offers great performance with the A14 Bionic chip and 5G support.

info.name: iPhone SE (2020)
info.description: Compact and affordable, the iPhone SE offers great performance with the A13 Bionic chip.

info.name: iPhone 11
info.description: The iPhone 11 features dual cameras and A13 Bionic chip for smooth performance.

info.name: iPhone XR
info.description: The iPhone XR features a Liquid Retina display and A12 Bionic chip.

info.name: iPhone XS Max
info.description: The iPhone XS Max features a large 6.5-inch OLED display and powerful performance.

info.name: iPhone 8 Plus
info.description: The iPhone 8 Plus features a dual-camera system and powerful A11 Bionic chip.

info.name: iPhone 7
info.description: The iPhone 7 features a powerful A10 Fusion chip and a great camera.

info.name: iPhone 6s
info.description: The iPhone 6s features a 12MP camera and powerful performance with the A9 chip.

info.name: iPhone 5s
info.description: The iPhone 5s is a compact phone with a sleek design and Touch ID.
